title: Beard Guyz Beard Serum with Grotein 20, 1 ounce
description: Description: Looking to start a beard? Need help filling in patchy areas? Our revolutionary Beard Serum with Grotein 20™ was created to kick off your beard-growing journey. Experience a sensational blend of ingredients that helps revitalize stubborn follicles and keeps skin moisturized. Mulberry, Sage and Ginger Extracts have anti-oxidant properties and work to promote healthy hair growth, and a splash of Quinoa Seed Extract helps your beard and skin feel silky smooth. Beard Serum with Grotein 20™ has the same amazing fragrance as our Daily Wash 35, Beard Oil 25 and other core Beard Guyz products. Directions: After washing and towel drying your face or beard, apply 3-5 drops of Beard Guyz Beard Serum with Grotein 20™ to your fingertips. Rub your fingertips together and massage the serum into desired growth areas for 20-30 seconds. Allow area to dry completely without touching. May be applied twice a day. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with warm water immediately. Keep away from heat or open flames.
